title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
descr: Observe gambling operation for irregular activities such as cheating or theft by either employees or patrons. Investigate potential threats to gambling assets such as money, chips, and gambling equipment. Act as oversight and security agent for management and customers.
alt_titles: Casino Enforcement Agent, Casino Investigator, Casino Surveillance Officer, Dual Rate Surveillance Officer, Entertainment And Recreation Industry Surveillance Operator, Gambling Monitor, Gambling Surveillance Observer, Gambling Surveillance Officer, Gaming Inspector, Gaming Investigator, Gaming Surveillance Observer, Gaming Surveillance Officer, Investigative Specialist, Security Officer, Special Investigator, Surveillance Agent, Surveillance Inspector, Surveillance Investigator, Surveillance Monitor, Surveillance Observer, Surveillance Officer, Surveillance Operator, Surveillance System Monitor, Surveillance Technician, Video Surveillance Agent, Video Surveillance Technician
experience: Some previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is usually needed. For example, a teller would benefit from experience working directly with the public.
education: These occupations usually require a high school diploma.
job_training: Employees in these occupations need anywhere from a few months to one year of working with experienced employees. A recognized apprenticeship program may be associated with these occupations.
example: These occupations often involve using your knowledge and skills to help others. Examples include orderlies, counter and rental clerks, customer service representatives, security guards, upholsterers, tellers, and dental laboratory technicians.
svp_desc: Individuals workers typically need anywhere from minimum of 3 and 6 months- up to 2 years- to learn the techniques, acquire the information, and develop the facility needed for average performance in specific situations.

work_tasks.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_tasks.task: Observe casino or casino hotel operations for irregular activities, such as cheating or theft by employees or patrons, using audio and video equipment and one-way mirrors.
work_tasks.descr: Observe casino or casino hotel operations for irregular activities, such as cheating or theft by employees or patrons, using audio and video equipment and one-way mirrors.

work_tasks.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_tasks.task: Report all violations and suspicious behaviors to supervisors, verbally or in writing.
work_tasks.descr: Report all violations and suspicious behaviors to supervisors, verbally or in writing.

work_tasks.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_tasks.task: Develop and maintain log of surveillance observations.
work_tasks.descr: Develop and maintain log of surveillance observations.

work_tasks.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_tasks.task: Monitor establishment activities to ensure adherence to all state gaming regulations and company policies and procedures.
work_tasks.descr: Monitor establishment activities to ensure adherence to all state gaming regulations and company policies and procedures.

work_tasks.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_tasks.task: Inspect and monitor audio or video surveillance equipment to ensure it is working appropriately.
work_tasks.descr: Inspect and monitor audio or video surveillance equipment to ensure it is working appropriately.

work_tasks.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_tasks.task: Act as oversight or security agents for management or customers.
work_tasks.descr: Act as oversight or security agents for management or customers.

work_behaviors.descr: The ability to communicate information and ideas in speaking so others will understand.

work_behaviors.descr: The ability to communicate information and ideas in writing so others will understand.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to come up with a number of ideas about a topic (the number of ideas is important, not their quality, correctness, or creativity).

work_behaviors.descr: The ability to come up with unusual or clever ideas about a given topic or situation, or to develop creative ways to solve a problem.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to tell when something is wrong or is likely to go wrong. It does not involve solving the problem, only recognizing there is a problem.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to apply general rules to specific problems to produce answers that make sense.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to combine pieces of information to form general rules or conclusions (includes finding a relationship among seemingly unrelated events).

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to arrange things or actions in a certain order or pattern according to a specific rule or set of rules (e.g., patterns of numbers, letters, words, pictures, mathematical operations).

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to generate or use different sets of rules for combining or grouping things in different ways.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to choose the right mathematical methods or formulas to solve a problem.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to add, subtract, multiply, or divide quickly and correctly.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to remember information such as words, numbers, pictures, and procedures.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to quickly make sense of, combine, and organize information into meaningful patterns.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to identify or detect a known pattern (a figure, object, word, or sound) that is hidden in other distracting material.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to quickly and accurately compare similarities and differences among sets of letters, numbers, objects, pictures, or patterns. The things to be compared may be presented at the same time or one after the other. This ability also includes comparing a presented object with a remembered object.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to know your location in relation to the environment or to know where other objects are in relation to you.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to imagine how something will look after it is moved around or when its parts are moved or rearranged.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to concentrate on a task over a period of time without being distracted.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to shift back and forth between two or more activities or sources of information (such as speech, sounds, touch, or other sources).

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to keep your hand and arm steady while moving your arm or while holding your arm and hand in one position.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to quickly move your hand, your hand together with your arm, or your two hands to grasp, manipulate, or assemble objects.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to make precisely coordinated movements of the fingers of one or both hands to grasp, manipulate, or assemble very small objects.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to quickly and repeatedly adjust the controls of a machine or a vehicle to exact positions.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to coordinate two or more limbs (for example, two arms, two legs, or one leg and one arm) while sitting, standing, or lying down. It does not involve performing the activities while the whole body is in motion.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to choose quickly between two or more movements in response to two or more different signals (lights, sounds, pictures). It includes the speed with which the correct response is started with the hand, foot, or other body part.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to quickly respond (with the hand, finger, or foot) to a signal (sound, light, picture) when it appears.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to make fast, simple, repeated movements of the fingers, hands, and wrists.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to quickly move the arms and legs.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to exert maximum muscle force to lift, push, pull, or carry objects.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to use short bursts of muscle force to propel oneself (as in jumping or sprinting), or to throw an object.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to exert muscle force repeatedly or continuously over time. This involves muscular endurance and resistance to muscle fatigue.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to exert yourself physically over long periods of time without getting winded or out of breath.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to keep or regain your body balance or stay upright when in an unstable position.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to see details at close range (within a few feet of the observer).

work_behaviors.descr: The ability to see details at a distance.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to match or detect differences between colors, including shades of color and brightness.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to see objects or movement of objects to one's side when the eyes are looking ahead.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: The ability to judge which of several objects is closer or farther away from you, or to judge the distance between you and an object.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Monitoring and reviewing information from materials, events, or the environment, to detect or assess problems.
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Looking for and Receiving Job-Related Information

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying information by categorizing, estimating, recognizing differences or similarities, and detecting changes in circumstances or events.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Inspecting equipment, structures, or materials to identify the cause of errors or other problems or defects.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Estimating the Quantifiable Characteristics of Products, Events, or Information
work_behaviors.descr: Estimating sizes, distances, and quantities; or determining time, costs, resources, or materials needed to perform a work activity.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Judging the Qualities of Objects, Services, or People
work_behaviors.descr: Assessing the value, importance, or quality of things or people.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Compiling, coding, categorizing, calculating, tabulating, auditing, or verifying information or data.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Evaluating Information to Determine Compliance with Standards
work_behaviors.descr: Using relevant information and individual judgment to determine whether events or processes comply with laws, regulations, or standards.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the underlying principles, reasons, or facts of information by breaking down information or data into separate parts.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Analyzing information and evaluating results to choose the best solution and solve problems.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Developing, designing, or creating new applications, ideas, relationships, systems, or products, including artistic contributions.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Keeping up-to-date technically and applying new knowledge to your job.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Establishing long-range objectives and specifying the strategies and actions to achieve them.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Scheduling events, programs, and activities, as well as the work of others.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Developing specific goals and plans to prioritize, organize, and accomplish your work.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Performing physical activities that require considerable use of your arms and legs and moving your whole body, such as climbing, lifting, balancing, walking, stooping, and handling of materials.
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Performing Physical and Manual Work Activities

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Using hands and arms in handling, installing, positioning, and moving materials, and manipulating things.
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Performing Physical and Manual Work Activities

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Using either control mechanisms or direct physical activity to operate machines or processes (not including computers or vehicles).
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Performing Physical and Manual Work Activities

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Operating Vehicles, Mechanized Devices, or Equipment
work_behaviors.descr: Running, maneuvering, navigating, or driving vehicles or mechanized equipment, such as forklifts, passenger vehicles, aircraft, or water craft.
work_behaviors.lvl_2_label: Performing Physical and Manual Work Activities

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Using computers and computer systems (including hardware and software) to program, write software, set up functions, enter data, or process information.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Drafting, Laying Out, and Specifying Technical Devices, Parts, and Equipment
work_behaviors.descr: Providing documentation, detailed instructions, drawings, or specifications to tell others about how devices, parts, equipment, or structures are to be fabricated, constructed, assembled, modified, maintained, or used.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Servicing, repairing, adjusting, and testing machines, devices, moving parts, and equipment that operate primarily on the basis of mechanical (not electronic) principles.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Servicing, repairing, calibrating, regulating, fine-tuning, or testing machines, devices, and equipment that operate primarily on the basis of electrical or electronic (not mechanical) principles.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Entering, transcribing, recording, storing, or maintaining information in written or electronic/magnetic form.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Interpreting the Meaning of Information for Others
work_behaviors.descr: Translating or explaining what information means and how it can be used.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Communicating with Supervisors, Peers, or Subordinates
work_behaviors.descr: Providing information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Communicating with People Outside the Organization
work_behaviors.descr: Communicating with people outside the organization, representing the organization to customers, the public, government, and other external sources. This information can be exchanged in person, in writing, or by telephone or e-mail.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Developing constructive and cooperative working relationships with others, and maintaining them over time.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Providing personal assistance, medical attention, emotional support, or other personal care to others such as coworkers, customers, or patients.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Resolving Conflicts and Negotiating with Others
work_behaviors.descr: Handling complaints, settling disputes, and resolving grievances and conflicts, or otherwise negotiating with others.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Performing for or Working Directly with the Public
work_behaviors.descr: Performing for people or dealing directly with the public. This includes serving customers in restaurants and stores, and receiving clients or guests.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Coordinating the Work and Activities of Others
work_behaviors.descr: Getting members of a group to work together to accomplish tasks.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Encouraging and building mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the educational needs of others, developing formal educational or training programs or classes, and teaching or instructing others.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Providing guidance and direction to subordinates, including setting performance standards and monitoring performance.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Identifying the developmental needs of others and coaching, mentoring, or otherwise helping others to improve their knowledge or skills.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.element_name: Providing Consultation and Advice to Others
work_behaviors.descr: Providing guidance and expert advice to management or other groups on technical, systems-, or process-related topics.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Performing day-to-day administrative tasks such as maintaining information files and processing paperwork.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Recruiting, interviewing, selecting, hiring, and promoting employees in an organization.

work_behaviors.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
work_behaviors.descr: Monitoring and controlling resources and overseeing the spending of money.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to concentrate on a task over a period of time without being distracted.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to shift back and forth between two or more activities or sources of information (such as speech, sounds, touch, or other sources).

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to generate or use different sets of rules for combining or grouping things in different ways.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to apply general rules to specific problems to produce answers that make sense.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to come up with a number of ideas about a topic (the number of ideas is important, not their quality, correctness, or creativity).

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to combine pieces of information to form general rules or conclusions (includes finding a relationship among seemingly unrelated events).

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to arrange things or actions in a certain order or pattern according to a specific rule or set of rules (e.g., patterns of numbers, letters, words, pictures, mathematical operations).

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to come up with unusual or clever ideas about a given topic or situation, or to develop creative ways to solve a problem.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to tell when something is wrong or is likely to go wrong. It does not involve solving the problem, only recognizing there is a problem.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to remember information such as words, numbers, pictures, and procedures.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to identify or detect a known pattern (a figure, object, word, or sound) that is hidden in other distracting material.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to quickly and accurately compare similarities and differences among sets of letters, numbers, objects, pictures, or patterns. The things to be compared may be presented at the same time or one after the other. This ability also includes comparing a presented object with a remembered object.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to quickly make sense of, combine, and organize information into meaningful patterns.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to choose the right mathematical methods or formulas to solve a problem.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to add, subtract, multiply, or divide quickly and correctly.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to know your location in relation to the environment or to know where other objects are in relation to you.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to imagine how something will look after it is moved around or when its parts are moved or rearranged.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to listen to and understand information and ideas presented through spoken words and sentences.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to communicate information and ideas in speaking so others will understand.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to read and understand information and ideas presented in writing.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to communicate information and ideas in writing so others will understand.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to exert yourself physically over long periods of time without getting winded or out of breath.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to bend, stretch, twist, or reach with your body, arms, and/or legs.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to coordinate the movement of your arms, legs, and torso together when the whole body is in motion.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to keep or regain your body balance or stay upright when in an unstable position.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to exert muscle force repeatedly or continuously over time. This involves muscular endurance and resistance to muscle fatigue.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to use short bursts of muscle force to propel oneself (as in jumping or sprinting), or to throw an object.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to exert maximum muscle force to lift, push, pull, or carry objects.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to use your abdominal and lower back muscles to support part of the body repeatedly or continuously over time without 'giving out' or fatiguing.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to quickly and repeatedly adjust the controls of a machine or a vehicle to exact positions.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to coordinate two or more limbs (for example, two arms, two legs, or one leg and one arm) while sitting, standing, or lying down. It does not involve performing the activities while the whole body is in motion.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to choose quickly between two or more movements in response to two or more different signals (lights, sounds, pictures). It includes the speed with which the correct response is started with the hand, foot, or other body part.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to keep your hand and arm steady while moving your arm or while holding your arm and hand in one position.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to make precisely coordinated movements of the fingers of one or both hands to grasp, manipulate, or assemble very small objects.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to quickly move your hand, your hand together with your arm, or your two hands to grasp, manipulate, or assemble objects.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to quickly respond (with the hand, finger, or foot) to a signal (sound, light, picture) when it appears.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to quickly move the arms and legs.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to make fast, simple, repeated movements of the fingers, hands, and wrists.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to focus on a single source of sound in the presence of other distracting sounds.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to detect or tell the differences between sounds that vary in pitch and loudness.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to speak clearly so others can understand you.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to identify and understand the speech of another person.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to judge which of several objects is closer or farther away from you, or to judge the distance between you and an object.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to see details at a distance.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to see details at close range (within a few feet of the observer).

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to see objects or movement of objects to one's side when the eyes are looking ahead.

behaviors_abilities.title: Gambling Surveillance Officers and Gambling Investigators
behaviors_abilities.descr: The ability to match or detect differences between colors, including shades of color and brightness.
